item.description:
Features

  • Quick break controls: Start short and long breaks directly from the menu bar

Improvements

  • Enhanced video playback detection with fewer false positives in Google Chrome and other browsers
  • Improved menu bar navigation
  • Redesigned Smart Breaks section in Settings UI
  • Notification settings reorganized and moved to respective Break and Clock Out sections in Settings

Bugfixes

  • Fixed flash reminder appearing when timer is paused
  • Fixed crash related to video detection
  • Fixed microphone detection for devices that serve as both input and output
  • Fixed menu bar visibility issue when only "Time" is displayed and DeskRest is stopped

View release preview on GitHub
